page.title: 17Homelife
page.content: Most of the families live in houses, although there are a few flats,bunga- lows and holiday flats.Children sleep in different rooms from their parents and usually there are separate rooms for cooking,eating and relaxing.The average family rises between 7 and 8am After breakfast father goes to work, the children go to school and about .5 of the mothers also go to work.After a day at school or work the family meets again for the evening meal between 5 and 7pm.About .5 of the families in Matlock Bath have two or more cars.All have a television,many two.Over.75 have a stereo and about .5 have a video.All the families have washing machines and fridges.Over .5 have a home computer.Weekends are the usual time for family trips and outings.Many go abroad for the annual holiday,while the rest holiday at a British resort.
